news.title: Covid in 2023
news.description: Washington DC March 9, 2023 (PAHO)- As the COVID-19 pandemic enters its third year in the Region of the Americas, the Director of the Pan American Health Organization (PAHO), Dr. Jarbas Barbosa, asked the countries to strengthen surveillance and fill gaps in vaccination coverage to end the emergency and better prepare for future health crises.
